Sentence: The raffle is a special one, however, which pits Jerry against school thug Emile Janza
The students who buy raffle tickets get to write on them a boxing move, directing Jerry to hit Janza or vice versa, and where
During the fight, Jerry and Janza are hitting each other as directed
Janza is much stronger, and his (Jerry) punches have much more staying power even though Jerry lands a good hit of his (Jerry) own
Then, a member of The Vigils draws a raffle ticket that tells Janza to hit Jerry in the groin
Janza decides not to abide by any rules, and punches Jerry over and over
